text: King of All Kings is the second album by Florida death metal band Hate Eternal. It was released on September 16, 2002, by Earache Records and, like their debut, produced by the band's frontman Erik Rutan. == Track listing == All songs by Erik Rutan except when noted. # "Our Beckoning" – 0:49 # "King of All Kings" – 2:49 (Rutan, Anderson) # "The Obscure Terror" – 3:53 # "Servants of the Gods" – 2:56 # "Beyond Redemption" – 3:08 (Rutan, Anderson) # "Born by Fire" – 3:43 (Rutan, Anderson) # "Chants in Declaration" – 4:05 # "Rising Legions of Black" – 3:24 (Rutan, Anderson) # "In Spirit (The Power of Mana)" – 4:31 # "Powers That Be" – 4:30 == Personnel == * Erik Rutan - guitars, lead vocals * Jared Anderson - bass, backing vocals * Derek Roddy - drums == References == == External links == * Hate Eternal official site Category:Hate Eternal albums Category:2002 albums Category:Albums produced by Erik Rutan Category:Earache Records albums
title: King of All Kings (Hate Eternal album)
